creator: jawarren@trentu.ca
text:
When compiling on Solaris 8 with all recommended patches and gcc-3.0.3, I get a
make error. The symbol `pcre_default_tables' is undeclared on line 2534 of
srclib/pcre/pcre.c (there is a declaration in dftables.c in the same dir).

Configured as:
CC="gcc" CFLAGS="-O2" ./configure --enable-auth-dbm --enable-mime-magic
--enable-speling --enable-so

creator: jawarren@trentu.ca
text: This problem did not occur when compiled with gcc-2.95.3

Can you please attach your srclib/pcre/chartables.c file?

This should be handled at srclib/pcre/pcre.c:261:

#include "chartables.c"

which includes the pcre_default_tables definition.

This file is generated from srclib/pcre/dftables.  I bet your compiler is having
problems producing or executing srclib/pcre/dftables.
creator: jerenkrantz@apache.org
jerenkrantz@apache.org
text:
Closing this bug as this works for me and we have received no response from
submitter.

creator: jwoolley@apache.org
text: One of my colleagues just now reproduced this problem.  I'll look into it.

creator: jwoolley@apache.org
text: hmm... nevermind.  turned out it was bogus compiler output from a modified gcc.  ;)
